sentences.en: A depression over the Atlantic usually brings bad weather in Britain.
sentences.cn: 大西洋上空的低气压通常给英国带来恶劣的天气.

sentences.en: a lone sailor crossing the Atlantic
sentences.cn: 独自横渡大西洋的人

sentences.en: A tropical storm is gaining strength in the eastern Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 在大西洋东部，一场热带风暴的风力正逐渐增强。

sentences.en: Atlantic City is the hot favourite to stage the fight.
sentences.cn: 在大西洋城举行这场拳击比赛是众望所归。

sentences.en: Cod are found in the North Atlantic and the North Sea.
sentences.cn: 北大西洋和北海有鳕鱼.

sentences.en: From there, the track continued through the Atlantic south toward Africa, but it was unlikely the satellite got that far if it started falling over the Pacific.
sentences.cn: 从那里，轨迹继续穿过大西洋向南飞向非洲，但如果卫星在太平洋上空开始坠落，它不太可能飞行如此远。

sentences.en: I wrote about this as early as 2005 in the Atlantic Monthly.
sentences.cn: 我早在2005年就曾在《大西洋月刊》上撰文写过此事。

sentences.en: Lucy Passmore has gone to her rest beneath the Atlantic waves.
sentences.cn: 露丝·帕斯莫尔长眠于大西洋海底.

sentences.en: NATO is short for North Atlantic Treaty Organization.
sentences.cn: NATO是“北大西洋公约组织”的缩写.

sentences.en: Shrill voices on both sides of the Atlantic are advocating protectionism.
sentences.cn: 大西洋两岸都在大肆鼓吹贸易保护主义。

sentences.en: So, ask businesses on both sides of the Atlantic, why have two lots of tests where one would do?
sentences.cn: 因此，大西洋两岸的企业都在问，当一套测试可以解决问题时，为什么需要两套呢？

sentences.en: The Atlantic coast is within sight of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 从宾馆可以看见大西洋海岸。

sentences.en: The Atlantic Ocean had undergone changes in temperature and salinity.
sentences.cn: 大西洋海水的温度和盐度已经发生了变化。

sentences.en: The Atlantic Ocean separates America from Europe.
sentences.cn: 大西洋把美洲和欧洲分隔开来.

sentences.en: The great Atlantic rollers surged in.
sentences.cn: 大西洋的巨浪翻滚到岸边.

sentences.en: The Straits of Gibraltar are the strategic passage between the Mediterranean and the Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 直布罗陀海峡是地中海通向大西洋的咽喉。

sentences.en: the windswept Atlantic coast
sentences.cn: 受大风侵袭的大西洋海岸

sentences.en: They underlaid the Atlantic with a cable.
sentences.cn: 他们在大西洋海底铺设了一条电缆。

sentences.en: This part of the west coast of Scotland is very exposed to Atlantic winds.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰西海岸的这一段完全暴露在大西洋海风前。

sentences.en: This river runs into the Atlantic Ocean.
sentences.cn: 这条河流进大西洋.

phrases.tran_cn: 大西洋城（美国新泽西州东南部）
北大西洋公约组织（等于NATO）
英国维珍大西洋航空公司

trans.tran_cn: 在大西洋里的，近大西洋的
trans.tran_en: relating to or bordering the Atlantic Ocean
